channel.title: Need a html developer
channel.description:
I need someone that can code html for my rs2006 website....
I ran into a problem with some images on the site.

item.title: Need a html developer
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

base:

<!DOCTYPE html>

<head>
<link href="css/rs2010/global-8.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="css/rs2010/oldmenu-8.css" rel="stylesheet">
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery/jquery_1_4_2.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery/jquery_placeholder_1_0.js"></script>
<script src="css/rs2010/globaljs-1.js"></script>
<title>Yourservername</title>
<link rel="SHORTCUT ICON" href="img/favicon.ico">
<link rel="apple-touch-icon" href="img/mobile.png">

<link href="css/rs2010/title-10.css" rel="stylesheet">

<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery/jquery_arturoSlider_0_9_5.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery/jquery_elide_1_3.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/swfobject/swfobject_2_2.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jagex/jagex_cookie-0.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jagex/jagex_spotcounter-0.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://oraclegames.co.uk/css/shadowbox/shadowbox-0.css"/>
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/shadowbox/shadowbox-0.js"></script>
<script>$(function(){
  Shadowbox.init();
  $("#slider a.caption").each(function(){
   if(this.href.toString().match(/\/title_video_popup\.ws$/) && Shadowbox){
    $(this).click(function(ev){
     Shadowbox.open({
      content: "http://www.runescape.com/title_video_popup.ws",
      player: "iframe",
      title: false,
      width: 640,
      height: 400,
      options: {
       displayNav: false,
       enableKeys: false,
       troubleElements: ['iframe'],
       overlayOpacity: 0.8,
       
        onOpen: function(){
         if($("#sb-caption").length == 0){
              $("#sb-info-inner").prepend("<div id=\"sb-caption\"></div>");
             }
             $("#sb-caption").html("<a id=\"sb-caption-link\" href=\"https://secure.runescape.com/m=weblogin/members/members.ws\">Click here to upgrade your account</a>");
             $("#sb-caption-link")
              .unbind("click")
              .click(function(){
               track('banner/videoPopup/Click here to upgrade your account');
              });
       },
       
       onFinish: function(){
        $("#slider").trigger("arturoSliderPause");
       },
       onClose: function(){
        $("#slider").trigger("arturoSliderResume");
        
         $("#sb-caption").html("");
        
       }
      }
     });
     ev.preventDefault();
    });
   }
  });
 });</script>
<style>
  #sb-wrapper-inner {
   -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 50px black;
   -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 50px black;
   box-shadow: 0 0 50px black;
  }
  #sb-title-inner {
   position: relative;
   z-index: 1;
  }
  #sb-caption {
   position: relative;
   z-index: 1;
   text-align: center;
  }
  #sb-caption a {
   font-weight: bold;
   font-size: 14px;
   color: #918c0b;
   text-decoration: none;
  }
  #sb-caption a:hover {
   text-decoration: underline;
  }
 </style>

<script src="css/rs2010/titlejs-4.js"></script>

<script>var GASTUB = "http://frostblades.no-ip.biz";</script>
</head>

<body class="BgBody">

<div class="BgHead1">
<div class="BgHead2">
<div class="BgFoot">
<div class="BgWidth">
<a name="top"></a>

<header><div id="Header">
<h1><span>Yourservername - </span>Yourservername - We win, you lose.</h1>

<a id="Playnow" class="HoverImg" href="forums/index.php?action=pages"><img src="img/global/playc4ca.jpg?1" alt="Play Now"></a>
<span id="PlayerCount">There are <b><font color="green"/>2 </font>players currently online!</span>
</div></header>
<nav>

 <li class="top"><a id="play" class="tl" href="http://www.Yourservername.com/forums/index.php?action=pages" onclick="try{pageTracker._trackPageview('/play_game/menu/top')}catch(x){}; try{_pageTracker._trackPageview('/play_game/menu/top')}catch(x){}"><span class="ts">Play Now </span><!--[if gt IE 6]><!--></a><!--<![endif]-->

 </ul>
 <!--[if lte IE 6]></td></tr></table></a><![endif]-->
 </li>
 
 <li class="top"><a id="guide" class="tl" href="help/wifb.html"><span class="ts">Game Guide </span><!--[if gt IE 6]><!--></a><!--<![endif]-->

 <ul>
 <li><a href="http://www.Yourservername.com/vote.php" class="fly"><span>Vote for Cash </span></a></li>
 <li><a href="http://www.Yourservername.com/donate/" class="fly"><span>Donate to Yourservername </span></a></li>
 </ul>
 <!--[if lte IE 6]></td></tr></table></a><![endif]-->
 </li>
<br class="clear" />
</ul>

</div>
</nav>
<div class="PageBody1"><div class="PageBody2"><div class="PageFoot"><div class="PageHead">
<div class="Left">
<div id="slider" class="Shadow sliderJS">
<div class="Shadow"></div>
<div class="Caster">
<img class="slide" src="img/main/home2010/banners/easter-2011.jpg" alt="">
<img class="slide" src="img/main/home2010/banners/clans.jpg" alt="">
<img class="slide" src="img/main/home2010/banners/custom-tshirts.jpg" alt="">
<img class="slide" src="img/main/home2010/banners/game-bar.jpg" alt="">
<div id="slideCaption"></div>

<a href="#" class="caption">
<h3>Tormented Demons</h3>
<span>Think you have what it takes to take on the Tormented Demons and get the sacred Dragon Claws?</span>

</a>

<a href="#" class="caption" style="display: none;">
<h3>Tz-Tok Jad!</h3>
<span>After years of enslavement the beast has escaped! He is returning but more angry and powerful than ever! He once again rules the TzHaar caves!</span>
</a>

<a href="#" class="caption" style="display: none;">
<h3>Nex</h3>
<span>A new creature has awaken inside the ancient prisons. Think you have what it takes to take on the legendary nex? Try it now!</span>
</a>

<a href="#" class="caption" style="display: none;">

<h3>WildyWyrm!</h3>
<span>A new breed of Strykewyrms has awaken. It lurks the wilderness for gaumless players, then strikes with its might!</span>
</a>
<div id="sliderControls"><a href="title2db7.html?news=0&banner=3" id="sliderPrev"><span>prev</span></a><ul id="sliderList"><a href="title8782.html?news=0&banner=0" class="current"><span>1</span></a><a href="title9277.html?news=0&banner=1"><span>2</span></a><a href="title8463.html?news=0&banner=2"><span>3</span></a><a href="title2db7.html?news=0&banner=3"><span>4</span></a></ul><a href="title9277.html?news=0&banner=1" id="sliderNext"><span>next</span></a></div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="news" class="Shadow">
<div class="Shadow"></div>
<div class="Caster">

<a href="title8782.html?news=0&banner=0" class="newsTab newsTabSelected spotTab" id="newsTabLatest">Latest News</a>
<div class="newsContent newsContentSelected spotContent">

<!-- News Post #1 -->
<a href="#" class="newsItem newsItemSelected spotRead spotLink" id="news4167">
<span class="spotIndicator" title="Unread"></span>
<h3>
<img class="newsIcon" src="img/news/icons/speechc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<span class="newsTitle">Stuff Here</span>
<span class="newsPosted">Posted 8-Jun-2012</span>
</h3>
<img class="newsImage" src="img/news/icons/speechc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<p>Stuff here.</p>

<div class="newsFlag">
Jun<br>8
</div>
<span class="newsExpand Olde">More ></span></a>

<!-- News Post #2-->
<a href="#" class="newsItem spotLink" id="news4232">
<span class="spotIndicator" title="Unread"></span>
<h3>
<img class="newsIcon" src="img/news/icons/speechc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<span class="newsTitle">Staff Soon to be Needed</span>
<span class="newsPosted">Posted 7-Jun-2012</span>
</h3>

<img class="newsImage" src="img/news/icons/speechc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<p>We will soon need staff members to help the server out; if you want staff just be active, helpful, and
follow the rules. If you ask, you will not be choosen.</p>
<div class="newsFlag">
Jun<br>7
</div>
<span class="newsExpand Olde">More ></span></a>

<!-- News Post #3-->
<a href="http://www.Yourservername.com/forums/index.php?topic=218.msg225" class="newsItem spotLink" id="news4216">
<span class="spotIndicator" title="Unread"></span>
<h3>
<img class="newsIcon" src="img/news/icons/speechc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<span class="newsTitle">GFX Artwork Done</span>

<span class="newsPosted">Posted 6-Jun-2012</span>
</h3>
<img class="newsImage" src="img/news/icons/speechc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<p>The GFX artwork for the server is done, this can be seen on our homepage and or by visiting this thread on the
forums.</p>
<div class="newsFlag">
Jun<br>6
</div>
<span class="newsExpand Olde">More ></span></a>

<!-- News Post #4 -->
<a href="vote.php" class="newsItem spotLink" id="news4208">
<span class="spotIndicator" title="Unread"></span>
<h3>

<img class="newsIcon" src="img/news/icons/speechc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<span class="newsTitle">Vote4Cash</span>
<span class="newsPosted">Posted 6-Jan-2012</span>
</h3>
<img class="newsImage" src="img/news/icons/speechc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<p>More players, more updates; it's that simple. If you want more players, updates, and a bit
of a bonus in-game(50M), then click here to vote.</p>
<div class="newsFlag">
Jan<br>6
</div>
<span class="newsExpand Olde">More ></span></a>

<!-- News Post #5 -->

<a href="donate/" class="newsItem spotLink" id="news4191">
<span class="spotIndicator" title="Unread"></span>
<h3>
<img class="newsIcon" src="img/news/icons/pollsc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<span class="newsTitle">Donations</span>
<span class="newsPosted">Posted 6-Jan-2012</span>
</h3>
<img class="newsImage" src="img/news/icons/pollsc4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<p>We are hosted 24.7 on a Linux VPS with 2.5G Ram, that doesn't come cheap. To help us keep the server up
and continue to improve it, click here to donate; you can also buy items and persk in-game with the points
you will recieve.</p>
<div class="newsFlag">
Jan<br>6
</div>
<span class="newsExpand Olde">More ></span></a>

<!-- News Post #6 -->
<a href="forums/" class="newsItem spotLink" id="news4203">
<span class="spotIndicator" title="Unread"></span>
<h3>
<img class="newsIcon" src="img/news/icons/quest-updatec4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<span class="newsTitle">Forums</span>
<span class="newsPosted">Posted 5-Jan-2012</span>
</h3>
<img class="newsImage" src="img/news/icons/quest-updatec4ca.jpg?1" alt="">
<p>Be sure to register on the forums to keep up with the community and updates.</p>
<div class="newsFlag">
Jan<br>5

</div>
<span class="newsExpand Olde">More ></span></a>
</div>
<div class="newsContent spotContent">
<span class="newsExpand Olde">More ></span></a>
</div>
</div>
<!-- End of News Posting -->

<br>
<div id="Info"> <!-- IMPORTANT! Do not remove the <h1> or stuff will blow up. -->
<h1>Yourservername:</h1>

<div id="Infotext">  <!-- IMPORTANT! Do not remove the <p> or stuff will blow up. -->
<p></p>

<div class="fb-like" data-href="Frost blades" data-send="true" data-width="450" data-show-faces="true"></div>

</div></div></div></div>
<div class="Right">
<div id="box" class="Shadow">
<div class="Shadow"></div>
<div class="Caster">
<br><br><br><br><br><br>
<a href="http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=frostblades.no-ip.biz"><img src="http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=frostblades.no-ip.biz][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/frostblades.no-ip.biz.png" allowtransparency="true"></img></a>
</div>
</div>
<a class="feature Shadow" id="fProfile" href="http://www.Yourservername.com/forums/">
<div class="Shadow"></div>

<div class="Caster">
<span class="featureImg"><span></span></span>
<h3>Forums</h3>
<p>Click here to visit the forums!</p>
<span class="featureTip"></span>
</div>
</a>

<div class="Shadow"></div>

<span class="featureImg"><span></span></span>
<h3>Play</h3>
<p>Click here to play Yourservername!</p>

<span class="featureTip"></span>
</div>
</a>
<a class="feature Shadow" id="fUpgrade" href="#">
<div class="Shadow"></div>
<div class="Caster">
<span class="featureImg"><span></span></span>
<h3>Surveys</h3>
<p>Can't donate? You can also do survey's to help us keep server online, while earning a reward!</p>
<span class="featureTip"></span>
</div>
</a>
<a class="feature Shadow" id="fGrand" href="#">
<div class="Shadow"></div>
<div class="Caster">

<span class="featureImg"><span></span></span>
<h3>Donate</h3>

<span class="featureTip"></span>
</div>
</a>
<a class="feature Shadow" id="fGuide" href="http://www.Yourservername.com/vote.php">
<div class="Shadow"></div>
<div class="Caster">
<span class="featureImg"><span></span></span>
<h3>Vote4Cash</h3>

</a><a class="feature Shadow" id="fBar" href="help/index.html">

Add the rest…
Replace Yourservername with your server name.
